exif:ImageDescription: In 1902, Ida Tarbell, the daughter of an oil refiner from Ohio who went out of business because of Standard, wrote a series of articles on Rockefeller...s famous deal with the railroads called ...The History of Standard Oil.... The article later turned into a book, bent on proving how arrogant Standard Oil was and making Rockefeller America...s biggest enemy.
